meanings.definition: The relationship between different dominions or territories.
meanings.sent1: The interdominion between the two countries led to peaceful trade agreements.
meanings.sent2: The interdominion among the neighboring states promoted cultural exchange.
meanings.sent3: The interdominion picnic brought together people from various lands for a day of fun.
meanings.sent4: The interdominion of ideas sparked a new era of collaboration between the regions.
meanings.sent5: The interdominion treaty solidified the bond between the nations.

meanings.definition: A competition or event involving participants from multiple dominions.
meanings.sent1: The interdominion race attracted athletes from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: The interdominion tournament showcased talent from different regions.
meanings.sent3: The interdominion bake-off had contestants baking traditional treats from their homelands.
meanings.sent4: The interdominion championship was a fierce battle for supremacy among the dominions.
meanings.sent5: The interdominion contest brought out the competitive spirit in all participants.
